title: [MULTISIG] Candidate Carmela Lerede (Trips Community)
body:
# Candidate

![CARMELA](https://tripscommunity.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/carmela.jpg)
![LOGO](https://youcomehere.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/600.png)

> "I am founder of a company that operates in the vacation rentals sector as property management and too real estate investor. Before these experience I was CFO and auditor in one of "big four". I love to travel and have been in Trips for 3 years, I give my support on financial issues"

💰 

**[LINKEDIN >>](https://www.linkedin.com/in/carmela-lerede-a0409b19/)**

----------------------------
# Role & Responsibilities

The multi-sig owners will be entrusted to sign transactions when instructed by the Community.
Multi-sig owners are NOT required to take decisions or participate in the governance.
On the other hand, they are free to refuse to sign a transaction if it seems unjust, non ethical or conducive to fraud/exit scam or similar moves.
In short: they protect the funds in the Carmela of the whole Community.
------------------------------
# The Vote
We are organizing the transfer ownership of the $TRIPS tokens from Luca De Giglio (the Founder) over to a multi-sig wallet.
The vote is open to any $TRIPS holders.
The more $TRIPS you have in this wallet, the more weight your vote has.
 
You may vote on any number of candidates.
You don't need to vote on all of them.

The Top 9 candidates will be elected to each hold one key, where 6 will be required to transfer $TRIPS.

Unfortunately the tokens in **[Uniswap liquidity pool >>](https://info.uniswap.org/pair/0x098ea160e3866cbffa5298a4b08de167b7130442)**  ![Uniswap](https://tripscommunity.com/en/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2020/10/uniswap-icon-e1602501932835.png) do not count for this vote 😞

#  VOTE 🗳️
choices: YES: I want Carmela to be one of the 9 multi-sig owners
NO: I don't want Carmela to be one of the 9 multi-sig owners
author: 0xce73904422880604e78591fD6c758B0D5106dD50
